answers.answer: Have you been diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes? You posted this in a Type 1 forum. You don't get rid of Type 1 diabetes, it is an autoimmune disorder. Unless they find a cure, you have it for life. Type 2 is a bit more of a grey area. Type 2 can be managed for many years with just diet and exercise and weight control, but ignore it and it will get worse.
well there hav been studies it can happen but check with your medical doc
I assume you are talking about type 2, sodapop. Since this is a type 1 forum, I think it's important to differentiate.
